noServerStorage: We don't store your data on our servers. Everything remains in your browser. Export JSON to keep a copy.
unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear all data? This action cannot be undone.
confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
validationError: Please fix the validation errors before continuing.
fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is 10MB.
unsupportedFile: Unsupported file type. Please select a JSON file.
corruptedFile: File appears to be corrupted or invalid.
inputDescription: Fill out the comprehensive form with all project details, benefits, risks, and requirements.
previewDescription: See your PAR document in real-time as you type, with professional formatting and layout.
exportDescription: Export to Word document or JSON format, or share a link for others to view and approve.
builtWith: Built with modern web technologies for security, performance, and reliability.
noDatabase: No database required - all data stays in your browser for maximum privacy.
professionalOutput: Generate professional documents that match industry standards and requirements.
bilingualSupport: Full support for English and Arabic with proper RTL layout and typography.
responsiveDesign: Works perfectly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
realTimePreview: See changes instantly as you type with live document preview.
easySharing: Share documents with stakeholders through secure, temporary links.
versionControl: Track changes and maintain revision history for your documents.
accessibility: Fully accessible with keyboard navigation and screen reader support.
openSource: Open source and free to use for all your project approval needs.
